name: Roots Soup 根·源
description:
Roots Soup is the 2023 Global Game Jam project built within 48 hours by 7 members team.

Story:

I am the owner of a tavern in a cave. In our world, foods are nothing else but roots. Maybe the ingredients are not so common, but I can read into the guests' thoughts and offer a soup that is unique to each person. Until that day comes ...... 

Gameplay: 

Click anywhere, just like other visual novels. You need to find clues and the right recipe for your customer. 

Roots soup cooking puzzle: drag and drop ingredients in the pot, and control the perfect heat to cook the soup. 

《根·源》是7人开发小队“洲际漫游”在2023 Global Game Jam期间48小时内开发完成的一款视觉小说+煮汤模拟解谜游戏。

故事背景：

“我”是一家地洞居酒屋的主人，这里的杂煮：没有别的食材，只有根. 或许食材不太常见，但我会洞察客人的想法，提供独属于每个人的汤肴。直到，那一天……

玩法：

点击屏幕推进剧情，从与顾客的对话中找到线索，并为顾客找到适合ta的完美配方。

煮汤小游戏，根据推理出的配方拖拽对应食材到锅中，点击长按火力按钮控制火候在绿色区域，直到煮汤进度完成。
